example.text: This predictably resulted in the highest inflation in four decades. American families have had to bear the brunt of this crisis, yet my colleagues on the other side of the aisle still seem to have no plan to tackle inflation outside of spending more taxpayer money.

GOOD NEWS: The Treating Tribes and Counties As Good Neighbors Act, bipartisan legislation I introduced alongside Congresswoman Marie Gluesenkamp Perez (D-WA), passed the House Agriculture Committee this week with unanimous support, 51-0, and was favorably reported to the House floor with a recommendation that it "do pass." I had an opportunity to discuss this bill with Vice-Chairman Shine Nieto of the Tule River Tribe of California in a separate committee, the Natural Resources Committee, during a hearing on the Save Our Sequoias Act.

Please watch my full remarks on the floor of the House here. I'm proud to cosponsor Congressman Dan Newhouse's (R-WA) Northwest Energy Security Act, which will protect the Lower Snake River dams and the clean, reliable power they provide.

Great to be joined by Vice-Chairman Nieto of the Tule River Tribe of CA for today's [[user]] hearing on the Save Our Sequoias Act. By expanding tools like Good Neighbor Authority to include Tribes and counties, we can better protect the Giant Sequoia into the future. [[url]]

We must protect our American history and stop the rewriting the historical importance of our great nation. Constituent Corner As the House and Senate welcomed President Isaac Herzog of Israel to a joint session of Congress last month, I was thankful that Idahoans with the Christians United for Israel could visit with my staff and I about the importance of American-Israeli relations.

Great to be joined by Vice-Chairman Nieto of the Tule River Tribe of CA for today's [[user]] hearing on the Save Our Sequoias Act. By expanding tools like Good Neighbor Authority to include Tribes and counties, we can better protect the Giant Sequoia into the future. [[url]]
